{ "status_code": 200, "text": " Henning Hermjakob, Head of Molecular Systems | People | EMBLâs European Bionformatics Institute
  • People directory
  • Henning Hermjakob
Related:
    Molecular Networks | EMBL-EBI

    Molecular Networks

    Head of Molecular Systems

    Henning Hermjakob

    Head of Molecular Systems

    hhe [at] ebi.ac.uk

    +44 (0)1223 49 4671

    ORCID: 0000-0001-8479-0262



    Teams

    Molecular Networks

    Biography

    Henning Hermjakob leads the Molecular Systems services at EMBL-EBI, which provide worldwide reference data resources in interactomics (IntAct), pathways (Reactome), and systems biology models (BioModels). He received his MSc in Bioinformatics from the University of Bielefeld and has been at EMBL-EBI since 1997.

    Publications

    Loading publications...
